page.title: 13Shopping LparishHPriors
page.content:
04400144 By questionnaire we asked people in the D-Block where they did their{main {grocery shopping. For HPriors For Lparish the the results were: results were: 26% Whitchurch 20% Village Shops 60% Andover 65% Andover 2\% Basingstoke 4\% Whitchurch 11% Southampton 7% Whinchester 3\% Southampton
Here is a{weekly shopping list }of a family of 2 adults,2 children aged 10years and 5years. ham, bacon, butter, sausages, biscuits, apples, beefburges, cakes, eggs, chicken roll, rice, bread, chicken, tea, tom.sauce, leg of lamb, rolls, baked beans tin crab, sugar, vegetables,
